post_title: FS: Nice looking Cobb bat on PSA 3.5
post_content:
Throwing this out there to see if any interest. In the process of shuffling my collection and doing some consolidating.....

Bat on Cobb graded PSA 3.5 in a newish holder (last couple of years). Clean card, looks good in hand for sure. Really like this card.....

Asking $7k obo.

Comment SOLD or shoot me a PM to discuss. 

Have this posted on some Facebook groups also.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2pNKCQK][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53693970771_d7cdfbc541_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2pNF6Dv][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53693085387_174e92aa09_b.jpg[/img][/url]

Nice looking card, Jeff!!

  Trent King
